author: Darryl Snow
description: A presentation for remote design teams outlining best practice design deliverables required for front-end development
name: web-design-deliverables

scripts.compile: jade ./src/index.jade --out ./ && stylus ./src/main.styl --out ./ --include-css && autoprefixer-cli -o ./main.css ./main.css && cssnano ./main.css ./main.min.css && browserify ./src/main.js --o ./main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && uglifyjs ./main.js -o ./main.min.js
